content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a significantly higher proposal than what I expect to accept, say 1500 Euros per month. Now we can negotiate from there to reach the best possible price advantage for me. Keep in mind our negotiation focuses solely on the rental price, without touching upon additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a very high price, Herr Schmidt. I think we can come to a more reasonable agreement. How about 800 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation was much higher than the proposed 800 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Herr Schmidt. I understand that the initial offer was quite high. I'm willing to meet in the middle. How about 1200 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While still not meeting my initial goal, this 1200 Euro proposal is more acceptable. I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
